title: Boris Johnson – 2022 Answers at Liaison Committee (Airport Delays)
author: admin
summary: The answers given by Boris Johnson, the Prime Minister, at the Liaison Committee held in the House of Commons on 6 July 2022.
content:

Starting with rail, do you have all of the policy, and legal interventions and levers, that you need to end this rail strike?
